statements: DELETE FROM PurchaseData WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier XYZ' AND purchase_quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM PurchaseData WHERE purchase_id = 100 AND supplier_name = 'SupplierABC';
DELETE FROM PurchaseData WHERE purchase_price >= 100 AND purchase_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_id = 1001 AND item_name = 'Laptop';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND supplier_id = 1;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3 OR supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE price > 500 AND purchase_date <= '2022-01-15';
